docs.lead_paragraph: INTERNATIONAL A3-11 Iraq Council Appointments Urged for End of May The caretaker government to assume sovereignty in Iraq on June 30 should be selected a month beforehand, said the United Nations envoy to Iraq, Lakhdar Brahimi, above, addressing the Security Council after his recent mission to Iraq to shape an interim administration. A1
